SVGAttributeCap-height.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The cap-height attribute defines the height of uppercase glyphs of the font within the font coordinate system.

blockquote.para: Note: It was specified to share the syntax and semantics of the obsolete cap-height descriptor of the @font-face at-rule defined in an early version of CSS 2.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
